Konsultbolaget med expertis inom AWS och: The consulting company with expertise in AWS and Cloud that helps you elevate your business to new heights!
Altostruct är ett konsultbolag specialis: Altostruct is a consulting company specializing in AWS. Our AWS cloud developers are certified through AWS and offer several services: Cloud migrations, AI, serverless and APIs. Altostruct was founded in 2020 and has since grown tremendously and helped several companies reach their full potential with the help of Cloud.
Vi har brutit ner hela molnresan i tre p: We have broken down the cloud journey into three services to make it easier for you as a client to improve your current system.
Vi hjälper er flytta ett nytt eller befi: We help you migrate a new or already-in-place system to AWS to cut the costs of having an in-house data center
Vi analyserar er AWS-miljö ytligt genom: We analyze your entire AWS environment by looking at and evaluating costs and agreements that can be optimized regarding costs without changing any of the underlying infrastructure
Vi ser till att säkra hela er AWS miljö: We make sure to secure your entire AWS environment so that it fullfills all security, integrity and availability demands your organization might have
Vi tar hand om dig internt så du kan ta: We take of you internally so that you can take of our clients in the best possible way
Någon som älskar det de gör kommer allti: A person that loves what they do will always do their work better than someone who doesn’t. Because of this, we put a lot of effort into pairing the right person with the right project. At Altostruct you will receive a lot of individual responsibility and autonomy, but also a great deal of support to make sure that you grow, both as a developer and a person. For example, we offer continuing education and further training. We are always striving to constantly challenge traditional ways of working to advance our vision and make sure our clients can take part in everything Cloud has to offer.
Vår vision är att göra det möjligt för a: Our vision is to enable all companies to build and host cutting-edge web applications and platforms in the Cloud, democratizing access to the most powerful technologies and resources.
Vi säkerställer kvalitet och leverans i: By working agile in smaller teams whose sole focus is you and your product, we ensure quality as well as delivery on time.
Vi tror på enkel och effektiv kommunikat: We believe in simple and efficient communication. In development, this is absolutely crucial. Therefore, we skip all the middlemen and offer direct contact between the client and the developer.
Vi arbetar nära kund och är lojala partn: We work closely with our clients and are very loyal partners. Through close collaboration, we develop a deep understanding of your specific challenges, which allows us to create better and more customized solutions. After the solution is built, we offer continuous maintenance.
Hälsa Altostruct teamet!: Say hello to the Altostruct team!
Vill du veta mer om Altostruct?: Want to know more about Altostruct
till oss så berättar vi mer!: and we would love to tell you more!
Vi hjälper er flytta ett nytt eller befi: We help you migrate a new or already-in-place system to AWS to cut the costs of having an in-house data center. Whether it regards an application you have just launched or if you have a long-standing data center, we help you migrate everything to AWS. Also, if you already have a cloud provider and are interested in switching to AWS, we’ll help you with this as well.
Hör av dig så hjälper vi dig!: Get in touch and we will help you further!
Vi ser till att säkra hela er AWS miljö: We make sure to secure your entire AWS environment so that it fulfills all security, integrity and availability demands your organization might have. We use a Virtual Private Cloud to be able to control and limit external access to your application. In other words, we secure all of your data by installing virtual “gatekeepers”.
Vi analyserar er AWS-miljö ytligt genom: We analyze your entire AWS environment by looking at and evaluating costs and agreements that can be optimized regarding costs without changing any of the underlying infrastructure. We also execute a more thorough analysis and present a proposal that generates larger design changes which will contribute to even lower costs and increased performance.
